definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

pinyin: kang4 zhen4 jiu4 zai1 zhi3 hui1 bu4

sentences.english: Japanese community in shock, has begun relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 日本社会各界在震惊之余，已开始全力抗震救灾。

sentences.english: The aseismatic fortify that strengthens crucial point branch and lifeline establishment works.
sentences.chinese: 加强要害部门及生命线设施的抗震设防工作。

sentences.english: So it is very important to detect the anti-seismic capability of building.
sentences.chinese: 所以对建筑物抗震能力进行检测至关重要。

sentences.english: The United States provided equipment for a seismic-resistant, spray-pond cooling system.
sentences.chinese: 美国提供了一套抗震喷水冷却系统。

sentences.english: Therefore, building structures that can withstand the power of earthquakes is a major concern.
sentences.chinese: 所以，建造具有抗震能力的楼房结构成为关注的重点。

sentences.english: Going among the masses to promote harmony requires carrying forward the spirit of earthquake relief work.
sentences.chinese: “深入群众促和谐”要弘扬汶川抗震救灾精神。

sentences.english: However the dam is safe though the safety factor is not very high.
sentences.chinese: 小湾拱坝坝肩抗震稳定是安全的，但安全裕度不高。

sentences.english: The special-shaped block and ordinary concrete block compression test and shear test were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 并设计了混凝土异型砌块砌体的抗震性能试验方案。

sentences.english: The seismic assessment and strengthening design for the Chinese Embassy building in Samoa, done by IEE.
sentences.chinese: 教育部办公大楼抗震鉴定与加固设计，由抗震所完成。

sentences.english: The seismic assessment and strengthening design for the Chinese Embassy building in Samoa, done by IEE.
sentences.chinese: 教育部办公大楼抗震鉴定与加固设计，由抗震所完成。

sentences.english: Foundation soil is usually considered to be rigid in the aseismic engineering design.
sentences.chinese: 在建筑结构的抗震工程设计中通常假定地基为刚性的。

sentences.english: V-TYPE eccentrically braced frame has well resistant-seismic behavior.
sentences.chinese: 型偏心支撑钢框架具有很好的抗震性能。

sentences.english: The aseismic Standard of setting up defences of an architecture affects the course and effect of saving oneself and saving each …
sentences.chinese: 建筑物抗震设防标准等影响自救与互救的进程和效果。

sentences.english: To manage PBSD, we should establish realistic performance objectives.
sentences.chinese: 实现性能设计，首先要提出切实可行的抗震性能目标。

sentences.english: The small-sized blockhouse architectures show good earthquake-proofing capacity as well.
sentences.chinese: 小体量碉房建筑也在客观上产生了较好的抗震作用。

sentences.english: The earthquake -resistant character of high-rise masonry structure with constructing measure has also been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 还分析了具有构造措施的砌体结构的抗震特性。

definition: to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
